content.text: MINISTRY OF TRADE AND INDUSTRY 3 MARCH 2024

page.title: MC13 delivers milestones: Continued exemption of customs duties on electronic transmissions, dispute settlement progress, new members and finalisation of IFD Agreement
page.date: Minister for Trade and Industry Gan Kim Yong represented Singapore at the 13th World Trade Organization (WTO) Ministerial Conference (MC13), in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, from 25 to 27 February 2024. At MC13, Minister Gan chaired the inaugural Ministerial Conversation on Trade and Sustainable Development.

summary: Minister for Trade and Industry Gan Kim Yong represented Singapore at the 13th World Trade Organization (WTO) Ministerial Conference (MC13), in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, from 25 to 27 February 2024. At MC13, Minister Gan chaired the inaugural Ministerial Conversation on Trade and Sustainable Development.
